itinerary.day1Overview: Meet on arrival at Mumbai Airport / Railway station and drive to Shirdi. Shirdi Sai temple is a beautiful shrine built over the Samadhi of Shri Sai Baba. Explore the famous Shri Sai Baba temple, established in 1922, dedicated to the revered saint who resided in Shirdi till his demise. Check-in at the hotel upon arrival. Enjoy leisure time in the evening. Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day2Heading: Shirdi - Shani Shingnapur - Shirdi (75 Kms / 1.5 hrs)
itinerary.day2Overview: After breakfast, visit the renowned Shri Sai Baba temple for Darshan or optional Kakad Arti. Explore Shirdi's key attractions including Dwarkamai, Chavadi, and Shani Shingnapur. Dwarkamai, adjacent to the Sai Baba Samadhi Temple, is where Sai Baba spent 60 years of his life performing miracles. Chavadi is a significant place where Sai Baba stayed every alternate night. Proceed to Shani Shingnapur, known for its unique temple dedicated to Lord Shanidev. Return to Shirdi in the evening to attend the Arti at Shirdi Dham. Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: After breakfast, drive back to Mumbai. On arrival, transfer to Airport/Railway station for your onward destination.

overView.heading: Mumbai: A City of Dreams and Diversity
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the vibrant spirit of Mumbai, a bustling metropolis known for its cultural diversity and iconic landmarks. Explore the city's pulsating energy, scenic coastline, and rich heritage, creating an unforgettable tapestry of experiences.

overView.heading: Journey to Lonavala: Nature's Retreat
overView.text: Embark on a scenic drive to Lonavala, a picturesque hill station nestled in the Sahyadri range. Discover tranquil landscapes, majestic waterfalls, and historic caves. Lonavala offers a perfect escape from city life amidst nature's embrace.

overView.heading: Exploring Lonavala's Natural Wonders
overView.text: Unveil Lonavala's natural wonders, from the pristine Lonavala Lake to the scenic Tungarli Lake. Explore the ancient Karla Caves, a treasure trove of Buddhist history, and ascend the historic Lohagad Fort for panoramic views of the lush surroundings.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of Mumbai and Lonavala
overView.text: Indulge in Mumbai's eclectic cuisine, from street food delights like vada pav and pav bhaji to coastal seafood specialties. In Lonavala, savor local delicacies like chikki and enjoy a blend of regional flavors amidst the serene hillside.

overView.heading: Serene Retreat in Lonavala
overView.text: Experience tranquility in Lonavala's serene surroundings. Visit Ryewood Park and Shivaji Udyan, offering peaceful green spaces and historic temples. Relax by Valvan Dam and Bhushi Dam, surrounded by lush landscapes and cascading waterfalls.

overView.heading: Rediscovering Mumbai's Iconic Landmarks
overView.text: Revel in Mumbai's iconic landmarks, from the Gateway of India to Marine Drive's seafront promenade. Dive into the city's rich history at Elephanta Caves and explore modern attractions like Bollywood studios, reflecting Mumbai's dynamic essence.

overView.heading: Plan Your Mumbai-Lonavala Journey
overView.text: Craft your Mumbai-Lonavala adventure, blending urban exploration with nature's allure. Delight in Mumbai's cosmopolitan charm and unwind in Lonavala's tranquil ambiance, creating cherished memories of this captivating journey.
